content: worked entirely in single_crochet in rounds from the crown to the bottom edge then each ear flap is worked in row braids and a pompom complete the whimsical hat gauge 8 5 sts and 10 rnds = 4 /10 cm in single_crochet final measures hat circumference 19 75 /49 5 cm height excluding pompom and earflaps 8 5 / 21 cm adjustable
